short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your desktop or application using VIA Screen Share [Minimum VIA Version 2.5]

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VIA App wirelessly mirrors your Chromebook / PC Chrome browser screen to a display using a VIA device. Just add the VIA App to your Chromebook or PC Chrome browser and login to start presenting. VIA turns any screen into a meeting point for ideas to stream freely without conventional restrictions that use up meeting resources. VIA is a wireless audio-visual integrator that connects to an existing wireless network and links every device in a meeting room to the primary presentation screen. VIA gateways are real BYOD Wireless Collaboration devices for all your presentation needs.


Minimum VIA Version - 2.5
